name: We Are Illuminati
storyline:
What do pop idols, world leaders and scaly aliens have in common besides money, power and cleverly disguised spaceships?

They are members of the Illuminati!

Join them and influence as many people as you can, no matter what!
summary: We Are Illuminati is a strategy game where players take on the role of a secret society bent on world domination. The game allows players to control minds, insert subliminal messages into various media, and even manipulate the water supply with chemicals, all in the pursuit of gaining power and take over the world.
